entries.title: Elon Musk Rolls out ‘View Count’ Feature for Twitter
entries.description: Elon Musk arrives at the justice center in Wilmington, Del., on July 13, 2021. (Matt Rourke/AP Photo)

entries.title: LastPass Confirm Hackers Stole Customer Passwords in Recent Admission
entries.description: The logo for online password manager service LastPass is reflected on the internal discs of a hard drive in London, on Aug. 9, 2017. (Leon Neal/Getty Images)

entries.title: Musk Says Twitter’s New CEO Could Be MrBeast, World’s Biggest YouTuber
entries.description: SpaceX owner and Tesla CEO Elon Musk laughs as he arrives on the red carpet for the Axel Springer Awards ceremony, in Berlin, Germany, on Dec. 1, 2020. (Hannibal Hanschke/POOL/AFP via Getty Images)

entries.title: US Probing Automated Driving System Use in 2 Tesla Crashes
entries.description: The Tesla company logo on the hood of an unsold vehicle at a dealership in Littleton, Colo., on Aug. 9, 2020. (David Zalubowski/AP Photo)

entries.title: California Earthquake Puts Early Warning System to the Test
entries.description: A mobile phone customer looks at an earthquake warning application on an iPhone in Los Angeles on Jan. 3, 2019. (Richard Vogel/AP Photo)
